data: Experimental Station | Outlaw Joel Hakkyt | Asgard | Alpha Centauri

At the coldly gleaming Experimental Station they flung this choice in Outlaw Joel Hakkyt’s teeth: “Grinding, endless slavery on Asgard, that Alpha Centauri hell—or a writhing, screaming guinea-pig’s death here?”
